UNKNOWN_ERROR - Static variable in class com.rigado.rigablue.RigDfuError
An unknown error occurred.
updateFailed(RigDfuError) - Method in interface com.rigado.rigablue.IRigFirmwareUpdateManagerObserver
This method is called when an unrecoverable error occurs during a firmware update.
updateFirmware(RigLeBaseDevice, InputStream, BluetoothGattCharacteristic, byte[]) - Method in class com.rigado.rigablue.RigFirmwareUpdateManager
Performs a firmware update.
updateProgress(int) - Method in interface com.rigado.rigablue.IRigFirmwareUpdateManagerObserver
This method is called anytime the firmware manager gets a progress update from the device receiving a firmware update.
updateStatus(String, int) - Method in interface com.rigado.rigablue.IRigFirmwareUpdateManagerObserver
This method is called to provide a string based description of the current status.
